name: Firestarter (itch) (Wellwick)
description:
Stranded in the wintery wastelands, you must make your way to high ground and build a fire to get someone's attention. Make your way to the top of the mountain and light a fire to get the attention of someone and get rescued.

Make sure to manage your heat levels, if you get too cold you will die. You can collect wood as you progress and start fires.

Controls

Move - A/D or Left/Right buttons.
Switch between moving and setting up fire - Backspace
Roll your wood to build up heat - Space (Spam it!)

Credits

Jesterday - Sound and Music (see misunra.com) for more 
Wellwick - Programming and "Art"

Some wood textures used

https://www.myfreetextures.com/seamless-angled-light-wood-background/
